activity_differential: people waiting or resting on sidewalk at night
motorcycles passing by people on sidewalk
description: Two people are sitting on stools on a sidewalk at night, near a well-lit area with bushes, billboards, and street signs. Several motorcycles pass by on the street in the background. The environment is calm, with the people appearing to be waiting or resting.
